title: Deep learning based Image Compression for Microscopy Images: An Empirical Study. (arXiv:2311.01352v1 [eess.IV])
abstract: With the fast development of modern microscopes and bioimaging techniques, an unprecedentedly large amount of imaging data are being generated, stored, analyzed, and even shared through networks. The size of the data poses great challenges for current data infrastructure. One common way to reduce the data size is by image compression. This present study analyzes classic and deep learning based image compression methods, and their impact on deep learning based image processing models. Deep learning based label-free prediction models (i.e., predicting fluorescent images from bright field images) are used as an example application for comparison and analysis. Effective image compression methods could help reduce the data size significantly without losing necessary information, and therefore reduce the burden on data management infrastructure and permit fast transmission through the network for data sharing or cloud computing. translated_title: 基于深度学习的显微图像压缩：一项实证研究
translated_abstract: 随着现代显微镜和生物成像技术的快速发展，产生了大量的显微图像数据，这些数据通过网络进行存储、分析甚至共享。数据的规模对当前的数据基础设施提出了巨大挑战。减小数据尺寸的一种常见方法是图像压缩。本研究分析了经典的和基于深度学习的图像压缩方法，并研究了它们对基于深度学习的图像处理模型的影响。基于深度学习的无标签预测模型（即从亮场图像预测荧光图像）被用作比较和分析的示例应用。有效的图像压缩方法可以在不丢失必要信息的情况下显著减小数据尺寸，从而减轻数据管理基础设施的负担，并实现数据共享或云计算下的快速传输。为了以这样的方式压缩图像，多种经典的丢失压缩方法和基于深度学习的无损压缩方法得到了评估。
tldr: 本研究实证分析了经典和基于深度学习的图像压缩方法在深度学习图像处理模型中的影响，并以基于深度学习的无标签预测模型为例展示了图像压缩的有效性，以减小数据尺寸并保留必要信息，从而减轻数据管理基础设施的负担并方便数据共享或云计算。
en_tdlr: This study empirically analyzes the impact of classic and deep learning based image compression methods on deep learning image processing models. It demonstrates the effectiveness of image compression in reducing data size and preserving necessary information through the example of a deep learning label-free prediction model, thereby alleviating the burden on data management infrastructure and facilitating data sharing or cloud computing.
